name: Teri DOYLE and Isaac Harbarger, Administrators of the Estate of Nathan Harbarger, deceased, and Teri Doyle and Isaac Harbarger, in their own right, Respondents, v. James TESAURO, Jr., and Evelyn Tesauro, his wife, T/D/B/A Shady Grove Park, Petitioners

parties: Teri DOYLE and Isaac Harbarger, Administrators of the Estate of Nathan Harbarger, deceased, and Teri Doyle and Isaac Harbarger, in their own right, Respondents, v. James TESAURO, Jr., and Evelyn Tesauro, his wife, T/D/B/A Shady Grove Park, Petitioners.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 4th day of June, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the Order of the Superior Court is REVERSED and the matter is REMANDED to the Court of Common Pleas of Fayette County consistent with this Court’s opinion in Jacobs v. Halloran, — Pa. -, 710 A.2d 1098 (Pa.1998), Marino v. Hackman, — Pa. -, 710 A.2d 1108 (Pa.1998) and Shope v. Eagle, 1998 WL 149458, — Pa. -, 710 A.2d 1104 (Pa.1998).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
Teri DOYLE and Isaac Harbarger, Administrators of the Estate of Nathan Harbarger, deceased, and Teri Doyle and Isaac Harbarger, in their own right, Respondents, v. James TESAURO, Jr., and Evelyn Tesauro, his wife, T/D/B/A Shady Grove Park, Petitioners.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 4, 1998.
As Amended June 9, 1998.
